entry.title: Today in DeFi - Solend V2 Live, Avocado on Polygon zkEVM, LSD Degen Farm, and More...
entry.summary: Solend V2 Live Solend V2 phase 1 is now live with borrow weights, TWAP oracles, and outflow rate limits enabled on Solend contracts. Avocado Live on Polygon zkEVM Avocado Wallet now supports Polygon zkEVM. Built by Instadapp, Avocado is a smart contract wallet that allows unified cross-chain execution.

entry.title: Last Week in DeFi - Sushi Hacked, Ribbon Aevo Live, Ethereum Shanghai Coming, and More...
Today in DeFi - Sentiment Exploit & Recovery, MEV Blocker Live, Tokenomics upgrade, and More...
entry.summary: Sentiment Exploit & Recovery Sentiment got exploited and lost ~$1m in USD. The root cause of the exploit was a read-only reentrancy attack, which was used to manipulate the asset price. After a negotiation between the Sentiment team and the attacker, ~90% of lost funds had been returned.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Yama Live on Arbitrum, Balancer Halving, Farming on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Yama Live on Arbitrum Yama is live on Arbitrum. Yama issues YAMA, an omnichain stablecoin, and allows users to swap between YAMA and USDT without slippage or fees. Users can lend their USDT to the PSM to earn yield. Borrowers can borrow Yama against deposited collateral.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Hacker Returning Funds, Native USDC on Cosmos, Lending on Gnosis Chain, and More...
entry.summary: Euler Hacker Returning Funds Euler lost ~$200 million in a flash-loan attack on March 13. The hacker has now returned ~84% (approx. $176m) of the stolen funds while the negotiation is ongoing. entry.title: Today in DeFi - Consenys zkEVM Live, Polygon zkEVM Live, CFTC Sues Binance, ve(3,3) on Arbitrum, and More...
entry.summary: Consensys zkEVM Linea Live Consensys launched its highly anticipated zkEVM Linea with native Metamask integration. Polygon zkEVM Live Polygon launches the zkEVM mainnet beta. It’s an Ethereum scaling solution combining the zk proofs and EVM, supporting faster and cheaper transactions.

entry.summary: ARB Drop Live Arbitrum airdrop went live and eligible users will have 6 months to claim. According to Nansen’s public ARB dashboard, almost 80% of the airdrop tokens have been claimed, and over 60% of claimers have claimed their shares. Free Web3 Domain Based on your Twitter Handle

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Coinbase Received Wells SEC Notice, Sushi Served SEC Subpoena, ARB Airdrop Guide, and More...
entry.summary: Coinbase Received SEC Wells Notice The SEC sent a Wells notice to Coinabse regarding Coinbase's listed digital assets, including staking service Coinbase Earn, Coinbase Prime, and Coinbase Wallet after a cursory investigation. A Wells Notice is a notification issued by regulators to inform individuals or companies of upcoming enforcement actions. Coinbase states they will contest any enforcement in court.

entry.summary: Magic Eden on Bitcoin Multichain NFT marketplace Magic Eden expands to Bitcoin, enabling users to trade Bitcoin NFTs without paying royalties (for now). entry.title: Today in DeFi - Arbitrum Airdrop coming, Uniswap on BNB, Leveraged Trading, and More...
entry.summary: Arbitrum Token Coming Arbitrum has announced its token will come in 7 days. You can check address airdrop eligibility at https://arbitrum.foundation/ Uniswap on BnB Chain Uniswap is now deployed on the BnB chain with Wormhole as the designated bridge.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Replicated Security Live on Cosmos, Shapella Live on Goerli, Automated LPing, and More...
entry.summary: Replicated Security Live on Cosmos The Cosmos v9-Lambda Upgrade is completed and Replicated Security (the first version of Interchain Security) is now live. The upgrade will benefit the consumer chains with additional security and ATOM stakers will have more staking rewards.

entry.title: Today in DeFi - Euler Exploit Updates, Gearbox V3 Coming, Smart Contract Wallet, and More...
entry.summary: Euler Exploit Updates Euler was hacked for nearly $200M. due to a vulnerability that allowed the attacker to “create an unbacked token debt position by donating funds to the Euler’s reserves”. As a result, “the attacker was able to liquidate these underwater accounts and profit from the liquidation bonuses.”
